casebody.data:
No. 10-8599. Gene Polk, Petitioner v. United States District Court for the Eastern District of Michigan. 562 U.S. 1252, 131 S. Ct. 1558,

179 L. Ed. 2d 363,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1178. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
